channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2024070890
item.description:
Report X-2024070890

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-15T18:15:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-08
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was undeliverable and eventually sent to our Overgoods facility. The package was then found to be leaking. Inner contents- a piece of machinery labeled "Hydrogen On The Go" with a plastic bottle inside. The plastic bottle, missing its top is marked UN 1813. The shipment is being held for FAA investigation.
